title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid credentials and receives confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input a unique valid email address, username, and strong password.
Submit the registration form.
Confirm registration success message is displayed and user is redirected to login or dashboard.

title: User Registration Validation - Missing Fields
description: Verify that registration form validates required fields and prevents submission with missing data.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Leave required fields (email/password) empty or incomplete.
Attempt to submit the registration form.
Confirm appropriate validation errors are shown and form is not submitted.

title: User Login Success
description: Check that existing users can log in successfully with valid email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input valid registered email and corresponding password.
Click on the login button.
Confirm user is logged in and redirected to the account dashboard.

title: User Login Failure - Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify the system rejects login attempts with incorrect email or password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input an invalid email or incorrect password.
Attempt to log in.
Confirm an error message is shown and login is not successful.

title: Password Reset Workflow
description: Ensure users can request a password reset and change their password securely.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Click the 'Forgot Password' link.
Enter registered email and submit the reset request.
Confirm email with reset instructions is sent.
Follow the reset link and enter a new password.
Confirm password change is accepted and user can log in with new password.

title: Product Catalog Display and Variant Selection
description: Verify that product catalog displays correct categories, product variants, pricing, and availability updated from Printful.

steps.description: Navigate to product catalog page.
Confirm all product categories (apparel, gear, bundles) are visible.
Select products and view variants (size, color).
Confirm correct variant prices and availability are shown real-time aligned with Printful API.

title: Add to Cart and Persistent Cart Functionality
description: Validate users can add products and variants to the cart and cart contents persist across sessions with real-time quantity updates.

steps.description: Browse products and add multiple items with different variants to the cart.
Confirm cart drawer popup updates item count and details in real-time.
Modify item quantities within the cart and verify updates.
Close the browser or logout and revisit the site.
Confirm cart contents persist and quantities remain intact across sessions.

title: Multi-step Checkout - Valid Input Flow
description: Verify the multi-step checkout which includes shipping address, shipping method selection, payment via Stripe, and order confirmation.

steps.description: Proceed to checkout with items in the cart.
Enter valid shipping address and contact information.
Confirm dynamic shipping quotes are retrieved and displayed.
Select a shipping method.
Complete payment using valid Stripe card details.
Confirm order placement success message and receipt email notification.

title: Multi-step Checkout - Input Validation Errors
description: Ensure the checkout process handles invalid or missing input data gracefully with appropriate error messages.

steps.description: At each checkout step, input incomplete or invalid data (e.g., empty address, invalid card details).
Attempt to proceed to the next step or complete checkout.
Verify relevant inline validation errors appear and progression is blocked until corrected.

title: Printful Inventory Synchronization
description: Verify that product inventory and pricing update in real-time reflecting Printful API changes including bundle discounts.

steps.description: Trigger an inventory change in Printful (simulate stock reduction or pricing update).
Refresh product catalog on the platform.
Confirm updated stock levels and prices are accurately reflected in product listings and bundles.

title: Order Management - Status Tracking and Cancellation
description: Verify order status updates throughout fulfillment, user can view order history and cancel orders where permitted.

steps.description: Place an order as a registered user.
Access the account dashboard order history.
Confirm order appears with initial status (e.g., 'Processing').
Simulate status updates from fulfillment and confirm updates appear in user view.
Attempt to cancel an order eligible for cancellation.
Confirm cancellation succeeds and user receives notification email.

title: Guest Checkout Flow
description: Validate guests can complete purchases without registration, with option to create an account post-purchase.

steps.description: Browse products and add items to the cart as a guest user.
Proceed through checkout entering guest shipping and payment info.
Confirm order confirmation and tracking info are provided post-purchase.
Choose to create an account after order completion and complete registration.
Confirm new account is linked to the recent purchase.

title: Security - GDPR Compliance and Data Encryption
description: Validate that user data is handled and stored in compliance with GDPR and all sensitive data is encrypted.

steps.description: Review user registration and checkout data submissions.
Confirm all personal data fields include consent checkboxes as required by GDPR.
Inspect database records and network traffic during authentication and checkout.
Verify data is encrypted at rest and in transit, particularly passwords and payment info.

title: Performance - Page Load Speed and Mobile Responsiveness
description: Ensure that pages load within 3 seconds for core user flows and the UI adapts correctly on mobile devices.

steps.description: Using performance testing tools, measure page load times for homepage, catalog, cart, and checkout.
Confirm page loads complete within 3 seconds under normal network conditions.
Access the platform on multiple mobile devices and screen sizes.
Verify UI responsiveness, legibility, and functional elements render correctly without layout breaks.

title: API Integration - Backend Endpoint Stability and Data Accuracy
description: Verify RESTful API endpoints respond correctly to valid and invalid requests and enforce security policies.

steps.description: Send valid and invalid queries to key APIs like product catalog, user auth, and order management.
Confirm expected data responses on valid requests and error handling on invalid inputs.
Test role-based access controls on API endpoints using various authentication states.
Verify that unauthorized access is denied and audit trails/logging is generated.

title: Accessibility Compliance Testing
description: Validate that the platform meets WCAG 2.1 AA standards ensuring accessibility for users with disabilities.

steps.description: Perform keyboard navigation tests on key pages including homepage, product catalog, and checkout.
Confirm all interactive elements are reachable and operable via keyboard only.
Use screen reader software to navigate site pages.
Verify all images, buttons, and forms have meaningful alt text and ARIA labels as appropriate.

title: Admin Backend - Role Level Security Policy Enforcement
description: Verify that the database RLS policies restrict data access appropriately based on user roles.

steps.description: Access the database via the platform API with different user roles (admin, user, guest).
Confirm that users can only access or modify data permitted by their roles per RLS policies.
Attempt unauthorized data access or modification.
Validate that such attempts are blocked and logged.
